tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainability_initiatives (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
   description TEXT,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    consumption_value DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_metering(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_initiatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
